55.1.hd_quote: Spirit is abundance, but only when the conditions support its expression.
55.1.behavioral_axis: If the field isn’t right, the spirit won’t show up.
55.1.shadow_axis: Blames self or others for ‘no spirit’ instead of fixing the field.

55.2.hd_quote: Awareness that abundance can be threatened, so spirit becomes selective.
55.2.behavioral_axis: Keeps spirit for those who won’t waste it.
55.2.shadow_axis: Locks down too hard → looks moody or withholding.

55.3.hd_quote: Emotional openness to experience that discovers the true source of spirit.
55.3.behavioral_axis: Tries different experiences until spirit lights up.
55.3.shadow_axis: Interprets every low as lack → creates drama.

55.4.hd_quote: The capacity to establish relationships that nourish and stabilize spirit.
55.4.behavioral_axis: Uses mood to attract the right people to the spirit field.
55.4.shadow_axis: Lets other people’s mood commandeer the spirit.

55.5.hd_quote: The leadership to express spirit for the benefit of others.
55.5.behavioral_axis: When recognized, broadcasts pure spirit and everyone rises.
55.5.shadow_axis: If unrecognized, feels abandoned → ‘there is no spirit here.’

55.6.hd_quote: Spirit remains abundant regardless of outer circumstances.
55.6.behavioral_axis: Embodies that spirit is not conditional.
55.6.shadow_axis: If cut off, can look bleak or spiritually aloof.
